summary:

•	16+ years of executive international experience 
•	Negotiated deals with major MNCs such as 3M, Endesa & Magna 
•	Extensive experience with high technology ventures, especially in the energy and transportation fields 
•	Early career in the financial sector in New York
•	Degree in Industrial Engineering from the Santa Maria University of Technology, Chile

profile_positions.description:
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Currently
FOUNDER & CEO ALSET GLOBAL N.V.

Founding Partner and primary driving force behind this technology company and its affiliate companies. The company is focused on hydrogen mobility and hydrogen infrastructure in partnership with global companies. 

Mr. Galindo lead a team of experts that manage internal operations, business development, sales and marketing, IT, financial planning / reporting, operating / capital budgeting, customer relations and company’s investments. Prospective clients include all car manufacturers, bus manufacturers, energy companies and Governmental entities. 


HAMILTON CAPITAL S.A. 
2000 to 2003
Managing Partner 
Managing Partner of this International Trading & Investment Company. Directed the implementation of a sales network in twelve Latin American countries of products for the energy sector. 

HAMILTON INTERNATIONAL CAPITAL GROUP 
a US Company, 1998 to 2000 
Managing Director
A New York-based Investment Banking Boutique specialized in Structure Financing of Infrastructure Projects and Corporate Financing. Responsible for business development and origination. 

CRONHEIM INTERNATIONAL FINANCE, LLC
a US Company, 1996 to 1998
VP Securitization
A Structured Finance brokerage firm based in Chatham, NJ. The company focused on global corporate financing through sophisticated financial tools such as securitization of export receivables. Responsible for origination of foreign corporate portfolios. 


EDUCATION & CONFERENCE
Industrial Engineer, graduated at the Federico Santa Maria Technical University of Valparaiso, Chile (1988-1994);


PERSONAL: 
Ski, Golf, Meditation & Yoga.
